org.jujubeframework.util

类 CamelCase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jujubeframework.util.CamelCase

  • public class CamelCase
extends java.lang.Object
    驼峰命名法转换工具 
      CamelCaseUtils.toCamelCase("orderId") == "orderId"
  CamelCaseUtils.toCamelCase("hello_world") == "helloWorld"
  CamelCaseUtils.toCapitalizeCamelCase("hello_world") == "HelloWorld"
  CamelCaseUtils.toUnderScoreCase("helloWorld") = "hello_world"

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String toCamelCase(java.lang.String input)
      下划线写法转换为驼峰写法
      static java.lang.String toCapitalizeCamelCase(java.lang.String s)
      下划线写法转换为驼峰写法,并首字母大写
      static java.lang.String toSpecilCamelCase(java.lang.String input)
      特殊的转换：前两个字母不能大写
      static java.lang.String toUnderlineName(java.lang.String input)
      遇大写，则转换为下划线形式+小写

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
